name: Sympnia
description:
You've awoken in a strange house, with only your phone and a stranger to rely on. Will you make it out alive?

As crucial gameplay information is given through the smartphone, one is required to
complete the game.

How to play?

  1. Start the game by running 'start.bat'
  2. Enter the address in a mobile browser
  3. Have fun :)

Tip: The link can also be opened on a second monitor.
